data.title: Meggitt Aircraft Braking Systems
data.text:
Since January 2008, Meggitt Aircraft Braking Systems has been the trade name of the two Meggitt businesses supplying aircraft wheels and brakes, Aircraft Braking Systems Corporation (ABSC) and Dunlop Aerospace Braking Systems (DABS).

We are one of the leading aircraft wheels and brakes suppliers in the world, and have facilities on both sides of the Atlantic, as well as in Europe and Asia.

We provide aircraft braking systems to a diverse group of customers, which include, but are not limited to, airline operators, aircraft constructors, private aircraft owners and charter operators, governments and military operations, distributors and repair stations.

Our vision is: “To be the braking systems supplier of choice and employer of choice in our industry”.
